hmm_download module¶

hmm_download.download_hmm(families, dir)¶

function to download hmm profiles of families which names are in the list

Parameters

  • families (list) – list of families

  • dir (str) – name of directory to which data are downloaded

Returns

downloaded hmm files from pfam

Return type

file

hmm_download.get_names(list)¶

function to save names from data frame to list

Parameters

list (list) – list with first column of pfam accession numbers

Returns

list of accession numbers

Return type

list

hmm_download.load_data(filename)¶

function to load data with family codes from csv to dataframe

Parameters

filename (str) – name of csv file with columns with accession numbers with header

Returns

list with data from the file

Return type

list
